Translations.Text: allaah ke naam se, jo atyant krpaasheel tatha dayaavaan hai
sab prashansaayen allaah[1] ke lie hain, jo saare sansaaron ka paalanahaar[2] hai
jo atyant krpaasheel aur dayaavaan[1] hai
jo pratikaar[1] (badale) ke din ka maalik hai
(he allaah!) ham keval tujhee ko poojate hain aur keval tujhee se sahaayata maangate[1] hain
unaka maarg, jinapar toone puraskaar kiya.[1] unaka nahin, jinapar tera prakop[2] hua aur na hee unaka, jo kupath (gumaraah) ho gaye
